mapper.select: SELECT r.`order`, h.`name` AS hospitalName, dpt.`name` AS departmentName, doc.`name` AS doctorName, r.order_time, r.register_time, r.price, u.`name` AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, u.gender AS userGender FROM `cq-hospital`.register r JOIN `cq-hospital`.hospital h ON r.hospital_id = h.id JOIN `cq-hospital`.department dpt ON r.department_id = dpt.id JOIN `cq-hospital`.doctor doc ON r.doctor_id = doc.id JOIN `cq-hospital`.user u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.`order` = #{order};
